subject: Surgery and Surgeons
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Orlando Hernández, bothered by a sore right foot for the final month of the season, had surgery in New York to remove a bunion on the second toe, the Mets announced. Hernández, 42, is expected to be ready for spring training.
